author: kkolinko
msg: Clean an IDE warning about unthrown exception.
Since r1577757 the setSSLEngine() method is a pure setter, it no longer calls reset() and no longer throws an IOException.
(An alternative way to silence such warnings is to document the exception in Javadoc for the method).
